bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Qualifying Hardware for Helically-Applied Fiber Optic Cable Systems (WRAP Cable)
IEEE Standard for Qualifying Hardware for Helically-Applied Fiber Optic Cable Systems (WRAP Cable)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Performance and testing specifications for hardware used on WRAP cable systems in order to standardize testing, simplify procurement specifications, and assure product quality are established in this standard.

The purpose of this standard is to establish performance and testing specifications for hardware used on WRAP CABLE systems in order to standardize testing, simplify procurement specifications, and assure product quality.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
